question: INS JalashwaÂ  recently delivered 1000 metric tonnes of food grains as relief material to which country?
explanation:
Indian naval ship Jalashwa arrived at the port of Anjouan, Comoros to deliver 1,000 metric tonne of rice. It fulfilled the announcement made by Vice President on the assistance to the country in October 2019.
In June 2020, INS Kesari delivered Covid related essential medicines to the country along with sending a 14-member medical assistance team.
